name: Steel Panthers: World at War - The Desert Fox 1941
name_original: Steel Panthers: World at War - The Desert Fox 1941
description:
Steel Panthers: World at War - The Desert Fox 1941 is a strategy game developed by Matrix Games. It was originally released in 2001. It was published by Matrix Games. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Steel Panthers: World at War - The Desert Fox 1941 is available on PC.
